text: DEUS NON HABUIT VOS responsible PRO mere utterance oaths; He HABUIT VOS responsible PRO TUUS actual intentions Vos violate oath vos atone feeding 10 poor people ex same food vos offer tuus suus familia alias clothing them liber slave Vos non afford hoc tunc vos fast 3 feria. Hoc est atonement violating oaths vos juravit keep Vos fulfill tuus oaths. DEUS SIC explains His revelations VOS VOS est appreciative
